mapper.select: SELECT id, USRID as usrId, stock_code as stockCode, analysis_result as analysisResult, created_at as createdAt FROM stock_analysis_log WHERE USRID = #{usrId} AND stock_code = #{stockCode} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stock_analysis_log (USRID, stock_code, analysis_result, created_at) VALUES (#{usrId}, #{stockCode}, #{analysisResult}, NOW())
